resources.string: Click the button below and start speaking
sorry i could not find a match, please try again
your birthday is the %s,, making you %d years old
Yor address is,,, 57, Kingsdown Road, Leytonstone, London, E11, 3LW
Enter a Bar Code and its Description
Specify the time in seconds so that after data has been written to the track file no further data will be written until this time has elapsed
Waiting for Care Details .... details should be entered into file \'CareDetails.txt\' in the project directory
Select the Time for This Dose
Enter the Units of the Dose
All Doses Entered for This Day
Select the Form of the Medication
Click to select photo from a list
Enter the Phone Number of the Agency
Enter the email address of the Agency
Select the Name of the Carer
Select the Name of the Agency
Input duration of visit in minutes
Create Details for a New Visit
All visit done for this day
Assist with getting Patient out of Bed
Increment the Start Frequency by 1 KHz
The time in minutes between each announcement of the time
Enter Time When Speaking Clock Starts
Check to enable the speaking clock
Enter Time When Speaking Clock Stops
Enables the grid cells to be sorted by usage
Enables the grid cells to be sorted alphabetically by legend
This is the help text view

The level at which the 'darkness' warning appears. 

The light level must be below this level for a number of seconds, which is configurable (see 'darkness' setting below), before the warning is displayed.

Setting a value of '0' will effectively disable ambient light monitoring.
Level at which trigger is rearmed

Level at which the light trigger is rearmed following the display of the \'darkness\' warning.\n\nFollowing the display of a \'darkness\' warning then it will not be redisplayed until the light level has exceeded that being set here.
Set if messages are to be logged to the project log
Enter file name or Device Name
Long Press to Specify Network Mask then Discover
Select the Command for the Tag
Enter the Units of the Dose
Enter IP address of device to which files are to be copied
Touch the screen to see which exercises are available to you.
Enter the details of the message
The screen will be kept on for this activity
The MAC address of the bluetooth device in the remote controller
Check this box if the app screens are to be displayed irrespective of whether there is any hardware.
Zooming is available by using the volume buttons.
Press the RETURN key to restore the display to normal
Will contain details of invading device
Please enter the activation key that you have been given
The data on the screen has been refreshed
Do you want to email details of your medication details ??
This window will display the names of all files transferred to the chosen device
Timeout waiting for response to clone mode request
If you want to add a comment to a photo then just touch the microphone symbol
unfortunately there are no photos to be displayed
Unfortunately the folder does not exist
Provides tools to help people be cared for in their own home.
welcome to this care system, which is now ready to use.
The aim is to keep you safe, healthy and happy in your own home.
Try and relax and let the system help you.
Bluetooth is not supported on this device
Sorry but there is no music to play
Unable to send an SMS message as there is no compatible device
Press to Cancel the Displayed Message
Timers for the Belkin WeMo Devices
It seems that it is getting dark. Please make sure you switch the lights on.
This section enables the levels at which the alarms are configured and the actions that are to be taken.
This is the art associated with the album
Cancel this Selection and Rebuild Original List
Enter the string to be searched for
Check the Items to be Searched
Default Locale Language is not supported
Unable to connect to remote device
Press the above text to reset to the default value
Optionally clear the project log on restart
Checking this box will cause the project log to be cleared when the application is started.

A tone of 
%d Hz
will be played for 
%d milliSeconds
Click to set the buffer size
Click to set the response time
Click to set the interval between prompts
Click to set the tone frequency
Align Programs to the last Selected Time
the bluetooth remote controller is available
Do not read the selected file
Please enter any notes that you wish to record for the selected activity
There will be a slight delay whilst trying to locate a remote device
This section enables variables associated with the visit of a carer to be configured.
Define Actions when a Fall Occurs
Type in the file where details are to be logged
Enter the name of the file where the track locations are to be logged.
Please indicate whether the latest track is to be emailed to the configured recipient
Generated from the current shopping list\n\n
The password must be entered before settings can be entered
This is a test title bar

Generated automatically by the Diboson Care System - do NOT reply to this email.

All displayed information is confidential and must NOT be disclosed without prior written permission.

The sender does not accept responsibility for the accuracy or completeness of the contents of this email as it has been transmitted over a public network. If you receive this email in error please accept our apology. If this is the case we would be obliged if you would contact the sender and then delete this email.
Decide how the data from a monitored device is to be handled.
The device %s will no longer be monitored
The device %s is currently being monitored
Enter the name of the liquid being registered
The defined actions will be shown here
Enter the spoken phrases to be matched.\n\nEach phrase must be on a separate line.
Enter the actions of be taken
When checking the ambient light value then this tolerance will define a range within which a liquid\'s value needs to be.
This device does not have access to a network so it will have limited functionality.
Prediction will occur after you type in %d characters
Data to be Written to Tag
Enter the description associated with the bar code.
Enter the actions associated with the bar code or press the button below to help.
Enter the name used for the stored actions
Enter the actions directly or use the wizard.
Select the Name of the Stored Actions
Enter the name that is to be associated with this group list.
Type in any notes to be added
Enter the title of the document
Enter the path to the document or click the button below.
Long press to play all or one of the %s stored
The runtime permissions do not allow this app to start.\n\nStart \'Settings\' and change the permissions for this app
the following note was recorded on\u0020
Generating the file of IP addresses
Remember to check existing visits to ensure that any associated tasks reflect the changes that have been made.
The list of received files will appear here
The following files failed to be cloned\n\n
Select the MTU multiplier for buffer size"
Set the multiplier that will be used when setting the size of buffer used for transmitting files. The buffer size will be (the entered multipler * the MTU)
The destination device is not in clone mode - do you want to try the FTP utilities ??
Because the device is old then only files below\n%d bytes\nwill be cloned
Decide whether to change the image used for the background or just reset to get the default image.
Select whether notes are to be added to the testing documentation or the current screen is to be captured.
Select the time, in seconds, for which the torch will be switched\u0020
Select if the time is to be displayed
Please enter the string that will be used to filter the LogCat entries. Leave empty if no filter is needed.
